org.apache.poi.hssf.model
Class RowBlocksReader

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.poi.hssf.model.RowBlocksReader

public final class RowBlocksReader
extends java.lang.Object

Segregates the 'Row Blocks' section of a single sheet into plain row/cell records and shared formula records.

Constructor Summary
RowBlocksReader(RecordStream rs)
          Also collects any loose MergeCellRecords and puts them in the supplied mergedCellsTable

          Some unconventional apps place MergeCellsRecords within the row block.

Constructor Detail

RowBlocksReader

public RowBlocksReader(RecordStream rs)
Also collects any loose MergeCellRecords and puts them in the supplied mergedCellsTable

Method Detail

getLooseMergedCells

public MergeCellsRecord[] getLooseMergedCells()
Some unconventional apps place MergeCellsRecords within the row block. They actually should be in the MergedCellsTable which is much later (see bug 45699).

Returns:
any loose MergeCellsRecords found

getSharedFormulaManager

public SharedValueManager getSharedFormulaManager()

getPlainRecordStream

public RecordStream getPlainRecordStream()
Returns:
a RecordStream containing all the non-SharedFormulaRecord non-ArrayRecord and non-TableRecord Records.
